TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit MatchCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
type MatchCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示通过以迭代方式将正则表达式模式应用于输入字符串所找到的成功匹配的集合。

span.span: Represents the set of successful matches found by iteratively applying a regular expression pattern to the input string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合是固定不变 （只读） 并且没有公共构造函数。The collection is immutable (read-only) and has no public constructor. 方法返回 对象。The method returns a object. 集合包含零个或多对象。The collection contains zero or more objects. 如果匹配成功，该集合填充其中一个输入字符串中找到每个匹配项的对象。If the match is successful, the collection is populated with one object for each match found in the input string. 如果匹配不成功，该集合不包含任何对象，并将其属性等于零。If the match is unsuccessful, the collection contains no objects, and its property equals zero. 将正则表达式模式应用于特定的输入字符串，正则表达式引擎使用两种技术之一生成对象：When applying a regular expression pattern to a particular input string, the regular expression engine uses either of two techniques to build the object: - 直接计算。Direct evaluation. 与特定调用生成的所有匹配项，填充对象方法。The object is populated all at once, with all matches resulting from a particular call to the method. 使用此方法时集合的访问属性。This technique is used when the collection's property is accessed. 它通常是填充集合的成本更高的方法，并需要更高的性能下降。It typically is the more expensive method of populating the collection and entails a greater performance hit. - 迟缓计算。Lazy evaluation. 在匹配的项的基础上根据需要填充对象。The object is populated as needed on a match-by-match basis. 它相当于正则表达式引擎调用方法重复并将每个匹配项添加到集合。It is equivalent to the regular expression engine calling the method repeatedly and adding each match to the collection. 通过访问集合时使用此方法及其方法，或访问使用时`foreach`语句 （在 C#) 或`For Each`...`Next` （在 Visual Basic) 语句。This technique is used when the collection is accessed through its method, or when it is accessed using the `foreach` statement (in C#) or the `For Each`...`Next` statement (in Visual Basic). 若要循环访问集合的成员，应使用由你的语言提供的集合迭代构造 (如`foreach`C# 中和`For Each`...`Next`To iterate through the members of the collection, you should use the collection iteration construct provided by your language (such as `foreach` in C# and `For Each`…`Next` 在 Visual Basic 中) 而不是检索枚举器返回的方法。in Visual Basic) instead of retrieving the enumerator that is returned by the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类，以询问一系列实例。The following example illustrates the use of the class to interrogate a set of instances. [!code-cpp[Regex_Words#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Regex_Words/CPP/words.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[Regex_Words#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Regex_Words/CS/words.cs#0)] [!code-vb[Regex_Words#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Regex_Words/VB/words.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (Array array, int arrayIndex);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CopyTo(class System.Array array, int32 arrayIndex) cil managed
public: virtual void CopyTo(Array ^ array, int arrayIndex);
abstract member CopyTo : Array * int -> unit override this.CopyTo : Array * int -> unit

param.name: array
param.span: 要将集合复制到其中的数组。

span.span: The array the collection is to be copied into.

param.name: arrayIndex
param.span: 数组中开始复制的位置。

span.span: The position in the array where copying is to begin.

summary.span: 从给定索引处开始将集合的所有元素复制到给定数组。

span.span: Copies all the elements of the collection to the given array starting at the given index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于集合复制到给定索引处开始的数组，目标数组必须至少与整个集合一样大。Because the collection is copied into the array starting at the given index, the destination array must be at least as large as the entire collection. > [!WARNING] > 此成员中不存在[!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]。This member is not present in the [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]. 如果你正在开发的应用程序面向[!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]，使用方法相反。If you are developing applications that target the [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)], use the method instead. 因为通常填充对象通过使用迟缓计算，尝试将集合复制已完全填充之前可能会引发异常。Because the object is generally populated by using lazy evaluation, trying to copy the collection before it has been fully populated may throw a exception. 如果匹配操作的超时值生效，并且尝试查找单个匹配项超过该超时时间间隔内，可以引发此异常。This exception can be thrown if a time-out value for matching operations is in effect, and the attempt to find a single match exceeds that time-out interval.

span.span: is a multi-dimensional array.
is outside the bounds of .
-or-

exception.span: 以及 在 的界限外。

abstract member CopyTo : System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match[] * int -> unit override this.CopyTo : System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match[] * int -> unit
Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: property int Count { int get(); };

span.span: Gets the number of matches.
The number of matches.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 访问的单个成员对象检索该集合的值来属性使正则表达式引擎填充使用直接计算的集合。Accessing individual members of the object by retrieving the value of the collection's property causes the regular expression engine to populate the collection using direct evaluation. ln 对比度，调用方法 (或使用`foreach`C# 中的语句和`For Each`...`Next`在 Visual Basic 中的语句) 使正则表达式引擎填充上作为集合所需的基础使用惰性计算。ln contrast, calling the method (or using the `foreach` statement in C# and the `For Each`...`Next` statement in Visual Basic) causes the regular expression engine to populate the collection on an as needed basis using lazy evaluation. 直接评估可能会生成比迟缓计算的集合的昂贵得多方法。Direct evaluation can be a much more expensive method of building the collection than lazy evaluation. 因为对象通常通过使用迟缓计算，尝试确定可能会引发之前已完全填充的集合中的元素数填充异常。Because the object is generally populated by using lazy evaluation, trying to determine the number of elements in the collection before it has been fully populated may throw a exception. 如果匹配操作的超时值生效，并且尝试查找单个匹配项超过该超时时间间隔内，可以引发此异常。This exception can be thrown if a time-out value for matching operations is in effect, and the attempt to find a single match exceeds that time-out interval. ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性来确定是否对调用找到任何匹配项的方法。The following example uses the property to determine whether the call to the method found any matches. 如果没有，它表示找到了没有匹配项。If not, it indicates that no matches were found. 否则为它枚举匹配项，并显示它们的值并在其中找到输入字符串中的位置。Otherwise, it enumerates the matches and displays their value and the position in the input string at which they were found. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection.Count#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.matchcollection.count/cs/countex1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection.Count#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.matchcollection.count/vb/countex1.vb#1)] 正则表达式模式`\d+`匹配输入字符串中的一个或多个十进制字符。The regular expression pattern `\d+` matches one or more decimal characters in an input string.

span.span: A time-out occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed
abstract member GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.IEnumerator override this.GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.IEnumerator

summary.span: 提供一个循环访问集合的枚举器。

span.span: Provides an enumerator that iterates through the collection.

returns.span: 包含 中所有 对象的对象。

span.span: An object that contains all objects within the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 而不是调用方法来检索枚举器，可用于循环访问对象在集合中，应使用组迭代构造 (如`foreach`在 C# 和`For Each`...`Next`Instead of calling the method to retrieve an enumerator that lets you iterate through the objects in the collection, you should use the group iteration construct (such as `foreach` in C# and `For Each`…`Next` 在 Visual Basic) 中提供的编程语言。in Visual Basic) provided by your programming language. 循环访问的成员对象使用方法 (或`foreach`C# 中的语句和`For Each`...`Next`在 Visual Basic 中的语句) 使正则表达式引擎填充上作为集合所需的基础使用惰性计算。Iterating the members of the object using the method (or the `foreach` statement in C# and the `For Each`...`Next` statement in Visual Basic) causes the regular expression engine to populate the collection on an as needed basis using lazy evaluation. 这是类似于反复调用方法，并添加到匹配结果对象。This is analogous to repeatedly calling the method, and then adding the resulting match to the object. 正则表达式引擎与此相反，使用直接计算来填充集合一次性时访问属性。In contrast, the regular expression engine uses direct evaluation to populate the collection all at once when the property is accessed. 这可以是构建于迟缓计算的集合的昂贵得多方法。This can be a much more expensive method of building the collection than lazy evaluation. 因为通常填充对象通过使用迟缓计算，尝试导航到集合的下一个成员可能会引发异常。Because the object is generally populated by using lazy evaluation, trying to navigate to the next member of the collection may throw a exception. 如果匹配操作的超时值生效，并且尝试查找下一个匹配项超过该超时时间间隔内，可以引发此异常。This exception can be thrown if a time-out value for matching operations is in effect, and the attempt to find the next match exceeds that time-out interval.

span.span: A time-out occurred.

span.span: Index into the collection.

summary.span: 获取该集合的单个成员。

span.span: Gets an individual member of the collection.

value.span: 位于集合中 位置的捕获子字符串。

span.span: The captured substring at position in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 C# 中，属性是一个索引器; 它不显式引用在代码中，而是允许集合可访问，就好像数组。In C#, the property is an indexer; it is not explicitly referenced in code, but instead allows the collection to be accessed as if it were an array. 中的各项通常情况下，对象通过索引访问它们只有在已确定从集合中项的总数后属性。Typically, individual items in the object are accessed by their index only after the total number of items in the collection has been determined from the property. 但是，访问属性使正则表达式引擎能够使用直接计算来生成一次性的集合。However, accessing the property causes the regular expression engine to use direct evaluation to build the collection all at once. 这是通常比循环访问集合使用开销更大方法中，C#`foreach`语句或 Visual Basic `For Each`...`Next`语句。This is typically more expensive than iterating the collection using the method, the C# `foreach` statement, or the Visual Basic `For Each`...`Next` statement. 因为通常填充对象通过使用迟缓计算，尝试导航到特定的匹配项可能会引发异常。Because the object is generally populated by using lazy evaluation, trying to navigate to a specific match may throw a exception. 如果匹配操作的超时值生效，并且尝试查找特定的匹配项超过该超时时间间隔内，可以引发此异常。This exception can be thrown if a time-out value for matching operations is in effect, and the attempt to find a specific match exceeds that time-out interval. ## Examples 下面的示例分析 Nathaniel Hawthorne 的第一个句子*房屋的七个 Gables* ，并返回对象，其中包含与任一的大写或小写字母"h"开头的所有单词。The following example parses the first sentence of Nathaniel Hawthorne's *House of the Seven Gables* and returns a object that contains all words that begin with either an uppercase or lowercase "h". 然后使用属性来检索每个单词并将其显示到控制台。The property is then used to retrieve each word and display it to the console. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection.Item#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection.Item/cs/RegEx_24804.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection.Item#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection.Item/vb/RegEx_24804.vb#1)] 此示例产生以下输出：The example produces the following output: ``` Half house huge ```

span.span: is less than 0 or greater than or equal to .
A time-out occurred.
